A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was so excited to see The Last Jedi but It’s hugely disappointing\, a big middle finger to Star Wars fans. It’s not that people are impossible to please\, we just expect “great” from our Star Wars. I would fire the director on down before i even planned the next one if I we’re them. The crowd had no joy on their faces\, they looked downtrodden and beat. Shame on you guys!
